title: I can't find rune pages
body:
Help needed. I can't find rune pages in shop, searched whole shop like 10 times and still can't find it... maybe i'm stupid :P
So if anyone can tell me is it only me or rune pages really can't be bought

replies.body:
Runes pages can be found in the *Gameplay* section of the store, just ensure all sorting on the left is set to *Show All*.

https://imgur.com/a/Voa4j

Let me know if this helped!
